RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT FORM_ID,FORM_NAME FROM OLTMS_FORM ORDER BY FORM_ID
SELECT MEDIA, DESCRIPTION FROM MSTMS_MEDIA WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' ORDER BY MEDIA
SELECT MODULE_ID, MODULE_DESC FROM SMTBS_MODULES ORDER BY MODULE_ID
SELECT BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME FROM OLTMS_BRANCH WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' UNION SELECT 'ALL', 'ANY BRANCH' FROM DUAL
SELECT CCY_CODE,CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' UNION SELECT '*.*','ANY CURRENCY' FROM DUAL
SELECT PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' UNION SELECT 'ALL','ANY PRODUCT' FROM DUAL

SELECT MSG_TYPE FROM (SELECT MSG_TYPE FROM OLTMS_MSG_TYPE WHERE MODULE=? AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT MSG_TYPE FROM OLTM_DIARY_MSG WHERE MODULE= ?) WHERE 1=1
